QuestData.Title: Along the Riverside
QuestData.Description: Vindicator Yrel has taken most of our forces north. She's establishing a forward base along the Skysong River.$B$BShe'll want to know that we're almost ready to move against Grommashar.$B$BI'm sure she can also use your help dealing with the Warsong orcs at Lok-rath.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Vindicator Yrel at Yrel's Watch.
